channel.title: Jesus on Understanding Religion
channel.description: Recent content in Jesus on Understanding Religion

item.title: Christianity
item.description: Introduction Christians follow the life and teachings of Jesus of Nazareth, a man born around the beginning of the first century in the land which is now Israel. One of the key tenets of Christian belief is that Jesus was not just a man, but he was also the Son of God - the result of a so-called ‘Immaculate Conception’ (his mother was not married at the time that she conceived).
